name: GOLGOL runner
description:
GOLGOL is a little gargoyle who fell from the roof of its biiiig house. It'll have to adventure through the gardens, the halls and the tower back onto the roof.

This game is a autorunner platformer in pixel art.

GOLGOL can switch between two colors to interact with different items ( keys - teleporters, etc ). You need good reflexes, rhythm, and anticipation to complete the 30 different levels.

This game has been developed in two month by two humans.

Stenodyon - developer

Huguette - artist

Thanks for playing the game, we hope you will like it  !

golgolstudio
